Package index

Coordinate transformations (coo_*)

Functions that transform shape coordinates

Basic transformations

Translation, rotation, scaling, and centering

coo_center()
Center coordinates
coo_translate()
Translate coordinates
coo_rotate()
Rotate coordinates
coo_rotate_around()
Rotate around a center point
coo_scale()
Scale to unit centroid size

Alignment and orientation

Align shapes to axes or specific features

coo_align()
Align shape to principal axes
coo_align_minor()
Align shape to minor and major axes (swapped)
coo_align_calliper() coo_align_minradius()
Align to special features
coo_untilt_x() coo_untilt_y()
Untilt to axis
coo_direction_positive() coo_direction_negative()
Ensure positive (counter-clockwise) direction
coo_flip_x() coo_flip_xaxis() coo_flip_y() coo_flip_yaxis()
Flip coordinates

Sampling and smoothing

Resample points along outlines

coo_sample() coo_sample_prop()
Sample coordinates
coo_sample_regular_radius()
Sample at regular angles from centroid
coo_smooth() coo_smooth_fixed()
Smooth coordinates

Point manipulation

Reorder, reverse, trim, and modify point sequences

coo_slide() coo_slide_closest() coo_slide_angle() coo_slide_direction() coo_slide_gap()
Slide coordinates along outline
coo_reverse()
Reverse point order
coo_trim_head() coo_trim_tail() coo_trim_both()
Trim points from outline ends
coo_close() coo_open()
Close or open outlines
coo_close_spread()
Close outline by spreading gap

Templates and transformations

Standardize and transform shapes

coo_template() coo_template_relatively()
Template shapes to standard size
get_transformed()
Apply transformation to coordinates
coo_shear_x() coo_shear_y()
Shear coordinates

Filtering and extraction

Extract subsets based on spatial criteria

coo_up() coo_down() coo_right() coo_left()
Filter points by direction from centroid
coo_baseline() coo_bookstein()
Baseline correction (Bookstein registration)

Shape measurements (get_* and measure)

Functions to extract and measure shape properties

Basic properties

Fundamental shape characteristics

get_centroid() centroid()
Get centroid of a shape
get_area()
Get area of a closed outline
get_perim() get_perim_along() get_perim_cum()
Get perimeter measurements
get_coords_nb()
Get number of coordinates

Size measures

Overall size and dimensions

get_centroid_size() centsize()
Get centroid size
get_centroid_size_norm() centsize_norm()
Get normalized centroid size
get_length()
Get length
get_width()
Get width
get_lw()
Get length and width
get_elongation()
Get elongation
get_calliper() get_calliper_ids()
Get calliper

Circularity and roundness

Measures of how circular a shape is

get_circularity() get_circularity_norm() get_circularity_haralick()
Get circularity measures

Shape complexity

Compactness, convexity, and irregularity

get_convexity()
Get convexity
get_solidity()
Get solidity
get_rugosity()
Get rugosity
get_compactness()
Get compactness
get_rectangularity()
Get rectangularity
get_rectilinearity()
Get rectilinearity

Convex hull

Convex hull extraction and analysis

get_chull() get_chull_id()
Get convex hull
get_chull_onion()
Get convex hull layers (onion peeling)

Distances and angles

Point-to-point distances and angular measures

get_centroid_distance()
Get distances from centroid
get_truss()
Get truss (all pairwise distances)
get_angles()
Get angles from centroid
get_angle_edges()
Get angles at vertices
get_angle_tangent()
Get tangent angles

Ranges and bounding box

Spatial extents and boundaries

get_range()
Get coordinate ranges
get_range_diff()
Get range span
get_bbox()
Get bounding box corners

Direction and position

Orientation and point location

get_direction_sign()
Get outline direction sign
get_closest() get_closest_angle()
Find closest point to target
get_closest_direction()
Get point closest to a given direction

Landmarks

Landmark extraction and manipulation

get_ldk()
Extract landmark coordinates

Transformations

Extract and apply geometric transformations

get_transform()
Extract transformation between two configurations

Cut and join

Split and merge curves

get_cut()
Cut outline at landmarks
get_join()
Join curves into closed outline

Unified measurement interface

Compute multiple measurements at once

measure()
Measure shape properties
available_measures()
List available measurements

Visualization

Plotting and display functions

pile()
Plot shapes stacked together
mosaic()
Plot shapes in grid mosaic layout
p() draw_landmarks() draw_landmarks_as_numbers() draw_outlines() draw_centroid() draw_first_point() draw_links()
Minimal plotting system for morphometric shapes

Pillar display

Custom tibble printing for morphometric data

pillar_colors
Customize pillar colors

Utilities

Helper functions and internal tools

get_coo_cols()
Identify coo columns in a tibble

Dataset

Helper functions and internal tools

bot
Bottles dataset
hearts
Heart dataset
wings
Wings dataset
shapes
Shapes dataset
